plot outline: Nathicharami is about Gowri whose life is perplexed between her physical desires and emotional beliefs. The film narrates the struggles of the protagonist in a society that believes physical desires can only be followed by a nuptial. She is stuck in her ordinary life with people from her daily life pattern who talk about their notions that are in contrary to the other. Finally, when she feels that she has overcome her ambiguity, the situation takes a leap. The film is also a grave narration about the nuances, women from all walks of life face.
title: Nathicharami
plot: _Nathicharami_ (qv) is about Gowri whose life is perplexed between her physical desires and emotional beliefs. The film narrates the struggles of the protagonist in a society that believes physical desires can only be followed by a nuptial. She is stuck in her ordinary life with people from her daily life pattern who talk about their notions that are in contrary to the other. Finally, when she feels that she has overcome her ambiguity, the situation takes a leap. The film is also a grave narration about the nuances, women from all walks of life face.::Pranati A S

Gauri is a widow whose life is perplexed between her physical desires and emotional beliefs. She struggles in a society that believes expressing physical desires should only be associated with marriage. Just when she feels that she has overcome her ambiguity, the situation takes a turn.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
